headline: Blackstone Launches BMACX – Blackstone Private Multi-Asset Credit and Income Fund
summary: NEW YORK, May 01, 2025--Blackstone (NYSE: BX) today announced the launch of Blackstone Private Multi-Asset Credit and Income Fund (BMACX), the firm’s first private multi-asset credit interval fund (the "Fund"). Investors can now access BMACX through select registered investment advisers.

raw.headline: Blackstone Launches BMACX – Blackstone Private Multi-Asset Credit and Income Fund
raw.summary: NEW YORK, May 01, 2025--Blackstone (NYSE: BX) today announced the launch of Blackstone Private Multi-Asset Credit and Income Fund (BMACX), the firm’s first private multi-asset credit interval fund (the "Fund"). Investors can now access BMACX through select registered investment advisers.
